text: FS Gelko Hasselt is a Belgian futsal team from Hasselt, playing in the Belgian Futsal Division 1.http://www.futsalbelgium.com/season/results.asp?comp=national_results&division;=1 The club was founded in 2016.https://www.fs-gelko- hasselt.be/historiek/seizoen-2016-2017/ ==Kit== The team is sponsored by Joma.https://www.joma-sport.com/en/sponsor/fs-gelko-hasselt ==Current squad 2018/19== Current squad as at: https://www.fs-gelko- hasselt.be/fanion/spelers-1/ {| class="wikitable sortable" align="center" style="text-align:center;" !Number !Player |Nat. |- !1 !Roy Sterkmans (GK) | |- !6 !Hamsa Zaaf | |- !7 !Abderrazak Ziriouhi | |- !8 !Anes Beslija | |- !9 !Jawad Yachou | |- !12 !Nermin Hasanbegović | |- !13 !Gerard González Martínez | |- !15 !Ilias Kaddouri | |- !18 !Dimitri Wagemans | |- !22 !Dries Lahraoui (GK) | |- !25 !Joren Paulus | |- !28 !Antoine Mageren (GK) | |} ==References== ==External Links== https://web.archive.org/web/20170727192429/https://www.fs- gelko-hasselt.be/ Category:Futsal in Belgium
title: FS Gelko Hasselt
